content: when i saw these mitts on instagram i knew i wanted to knit them yesterday but - there was no pattern leigh miller 1 had knit them up for a gift for a friend and had no plans to write a pattern so - i asked her if we could work together to get these out if i could write the pattern on her idea thankfully she said yes and this is the result **for english see below ** **-- n o r skip --** her kan du leke deg både med rester og farger - de minste restene er på 1 og 2 gram ett par veier 34 gram og består for det meste av én hovedfarge 25-28 gram et flott mønster for nybegynnere i mønsterstrikk det er ikke noe anbefaling på strikkefasthet i høyden men stopp der det passer deg hvis det som står anbefalt i mønsteret ikke passer størrelse overvidde 18 cm mansjett 6 cm mønsterdel 4 5 cm total lengde 22 cm tommel inkludert vrangbord øverst 3 cm **-- e n g l i s h --** *made for those tiny small leftovers using one main colour and less than 2 grams / 0 04 ounces for three of the contrast colours but if you have even smaller amounts of scraps why not mix&match ideal for absolute beginners in stranded knitting no row gauge given but just stop wherever they fit you if the recommended length does not fit * *measurments width 18 cm / 7 in cuff 6 cm / 2 5 in flower chart 4 5 cm / 1 7 in total length 22 cm / 8 5 in thumb including rib top 3 cm / 1 2 in* 1 http //www ravelry com/people/leighsideknits
